defs: a pool of water used for swimming; esp., an artificially created pool or tank, either indoors or outdoors and usually with water-filtering equipment; a swimming pool.
the dry gourd of the plant Lagenaria vulgaris of Cucurbitaceae family, used as an aid for floating in water.

a religious service to a deity by keeping the idol on a swing and playing back and forth.
to happen; to occur; to take place; to befall.
to be; to be available.
a rich man.
to move oneself by turning on one's axis; to rotate about on one's axis.
to lay oneself on the floor or bed and roll.
an indeclinable used to express the sense 'it is', 'it is available'.
to cause to happen; to cause to become.
to cause to manifest.
(dial.) to prove to be; to establish (a fact).
any round or spherical, object; a ball; a sphere.
a kind of tiny round seed or grain either fried in oil or cooked in steam.
= ಉಂಡಲಿಗೆ.
a ball shaped cake made of rice flour.
a useless, habitually lazy but gluttonous man.
the quality or habit of a person being gluttonous, and not willing to work or exert himself.
to dine and be playful.
to spend time without any purpose.
the tree Carallia brachiata (=C. integifolia, C. integerrima, C. lucida) of Rhizophoraceae family.
the hemp Hibiscus cannabinus of Malvaceae family.
the upper part of the passage leading from the mouth and nose to the stomach and lungs; the throat.
a design, initial or other device placed on a letter, document, etc., as a mark of genuineness or authenticity; a ring having embossed design for the purpose; a seal.
a government document issued to a citizen for travel abroad, certifying identity and citizenship; a passport.
permission, esp. in writing.
a compulsory payment, levied as certain portion of income, property value, sales price, labour, service, etc. by a government; a tax; ಉಂಡಿಗೆಸಾಧ್ಯ uṇḍige sādhya the territorial range of an authority.
a small piece taken out from a whole fruit, as for testing.
the hole so made.
to get a passport or a permit (from the concerned authority).
a small hand-staff fixed with a signet used to mark the signature on a letter, document, packet, etc.
to fix the official signature, symbol as a mark of authenticity.
= ಉಂಡಲಿಗೆ.
to shape in to a sphere or ball; to make a handful of meal in the shape of a ball.
a small, flat mass of solidified blood, usu. forming a crust on a wound.
any thing in the shape of a ball; a small sphere; a round mass as a handful of food in the shape of a ball.
an unbroken, whole mass.
= ಉಂಡೆಗಟ್ಟು.
